TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, but It's a WW1 Ration cookie, You don't need to fire at fritz, just poison him with one of these!

I wish people would take a look at my KSP Birthday game

Granted but so many do it breaks the fourms

I wish for a doughnut.

Granted, here's another Rush-baked good, Half-done, Salmonella filled lovely donut

AKA A baked bad.

I wish that pun wouldn't crack me up so much.

Granted, but it cracks everyone else so much they die and no one is left but you

I wish for a Friendly corgi <3

Granted, it falls into lava.

I wish everything is more fun

Granted, 20% cooler (MLP derailement or bust)

I wish for no hidden browser cache

Granted, your browser cache is now open for all to see, jeeze that's a lot of naughty sites :/

I wish someone would start a text adventure thread in the Games forum.

Granted, but it becomes so popular the forum breaks. AGAIN.

(Who's stopping you from doing this yourself?)

I wish Sal would make said game already.

Granted, but he became a abusive moderator

I wish to not have broke the rules

(I never heard of this -10 point thing, but have read the rules, maybe I should go read them again...)

Granted, but he became a abusive moderator

I wish to not have broke the rules

(I never heard of this -10 point thing, but have read the rules, maybe I should go read them again...)

You got that too? Huh, guess I'm not alone

oh BTW 100 Points accumulated before they expire = Permaban

Granted, you carry on unbeknownst to this, and eventually break the rules in one swift stroke.

I wish I hadn't broken the rules too...

Blue Dye = Breaking rules

Granted, the kid-admin ban you anyway

I wish that the people were happy

Granted, 'For a time the people were happy, but it could not last, for all their good intentions, the people lacked judgement.'

I wish I could animate Cartoons.

Granted, rule 34

I wish to forget that odd thing

Granted, you forget everything that isn't even

(Y u corrupt everything with Rule34)

I wish Pample would find something else to use as a corruption tool.

Granted, rule 34.2

I wish to forget those ponies, they drive me to drink.

Granted, but now you smoke and do Crystal meth

I wish i knew how to get rep.

The US gave us crystal meth, and Yeltsin drank himself to death!

Granted, but you still can't

I wish for EPICBAWAW EPICBAWAR ROR.

Granted but I dont even

I wish there were more people who knew the Soviet History song.

I am the man who arranges the blocks....

Granted, they all became communists!

I wish to a have a better avatar

(or OC, if you know what it mean)

You want me to corrupt that? anyway, Have one of my OCs.

http://imgur.com/a/5u2ql#0

I wish that they descend upon me from up above.

Edited November 3, 2013 by Annoyingorbits

Wait, they don't all have wings...

Granted, they fall on you and break your spine.

I wish to be an athropologist

Granted, but it drives you insane

I wish that one of annoyingorbits OC's was not from TRF song..........

Granted, it's a corpse in the background in Cupcake

I wish to know of which OC are you talking about

Edited November 3, 2013 by mrrpamplemousse

Wait which one is from TRF? sorry never seen it

Granted, I don't either so Can't help you there.

I wish I didn't randomly capitalise 'can't'

Granted, but you randomly capitalize every other one. (Its to the right of Romania. Might not be exactly from the video but looks like it.)

I wish for Sandvitch
